item.title: Black Swan
item.description: I’ve been listening to the book little by little. And I there are some interesting ideas in the book. One idea as I recall it is that if a war goes for one year, assume it will go for another year; if it goes for two years then assume additional two. So, first I got to think about unpredictability of finishing wars. Then I got some black-swan suggesting something else. And then things “normalized”.
